articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Reply Messages
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Reply Messages
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un sent messages to heads of state of various countries in reply to their messages of sympathy sent to him in connection with the typhoon which hit some parts of the DPRK, causing damage.
					 The addressees were Mohammed Waheed Hassan, president of the Republic of Maldives, Aleksandr Lukashenko, president of the Republic of Belarus, and Armando Emilio Guebuza, president of the Republic of Mozambique.
					
					 In the messages he expressed deep gratitude to them for their messages, believing that the relations of friendship and cooperation with those countries would grow stronger. 
						_

articles.title: CPRK Blasts Park Geun Hye's Press Conference
articles.content:
CPRK Blasts Park Geun Hye's Press Conference
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea Thursday gave the following answer to the question put by KCNA as regards the fact that Park Geun Hye, "presidential" candidate from the "Saenuri Party" of south Korea, pulled up the DPRK at a recent press conference, while bragging about her stand on the May 16 military coup and the "yusin" dictatorship:
					 On Sept. 24 when the issue of the "yusin" dictatorship surfaced as the main focus of the situation in the run-up to the "presidential election" in south Korea, Park Geun Hye at an urgent press conference made an apology to the victims, admitting the illegality of the May 16 military coup, the "yusin" dictatorship and the case of the People's Revolutionary Party, etc.
					
					 She made a sudden U-turn in her stand though she zealously shielded the May 16 military coup and "yusin" dictatorship as inevitable "historic choices" even shortly ago. Her gesture was prompted by the concern that she might be defeated at the "presidential election" as the people's protest is running high and support rate for her is sinking due to her remarks embellishing the "yusin" dictatorship while the popularity of the candidates from the opposition camp is rising.
					
					 What matters is that at the press conference she groundlessly pulled up the DPRK, asserting that the May 16 military coup and the "yusin" dictatorship were inevitable actions to cope with the "threat of southward invasion" from the north and defend "security".
					
					 On a series of previous occasions she justified the "yusin" dictatorship by malignantly accusing the DPRK, asserting that but for the May 16 military coup and the "yusin" dictatorship, south Korea would have been swallowed up by the north long ago as the former was fully exposed to the latter's "threat" because of its weak national power in the 1960s and the 1970s and suppression of democracy to a certain extent was not so serious when compared with this threat.
					
					 What was disgusting was that she was compelled to make an apology under the above-said embarrassing situation. People were much more stunned by her outbursts that the May 16 military coup and the "yusin" dictatorship were attributable to the "threat from the north". This is preposterous and a wanton distortion of the historical facts.
					
					 As far as the periods of the May 16 military coup and the "yusin" dictatorship were concerned, people's desire for peaceful reunification grew stronger in the north and the south than ever before under the influence of the April popular resistance and thanks to the publication of the July 4 joint statement and there was no "threat from the north".
					
					  The south Koreans said that national reunification was the only way for them to live after the April popular resistance. They expressed ardent desire and will for peaceful reunification, chanting the slogans "Let us go to the north, come to the south and let us meet at Panmunjom!"
					
					 In hearty response to them, the DPRK advanced the most just and fair proposal which calls for organizing a mechanism common to the nation, leaving the political systems between the north and the south as they are and enforcing federal formula for promoting uniform development between the north and the south in order to achieve the peaceful reunification of the country. 
					
					 Was there any "threat from the north?"
					
					 The situation that prevailed in 1972 when traitor Park Chung-hee cooked up the "yusin constitution" helps the world know well that the three principles for national reunification reflecting independence, peaceful reunification and nation's great unity were laid down by the DPRK and they were solemnly declared as the July 4 joint statement at home and abroad.
					
					 Was this "threat of southward aggression posed by the north?"
					
					 As already disclosed before the whole world, the May 16 military coup and "yusin in October" were fascist actions taken by Park Chung-Hee, a pro-U.S. and pro-Japanese military hooligan, to grab power and shore up his dictatorial rule.
					
					 Nevertheless, Park Geun Hye dared let loose the above-said outpourings. Her remark was an intolerable grave provocation.
					
					 What she uttered at the recent press conference clearly proves that she remains unchanged in her stand and ulterior motive over the issues of May 16 military coup and "yusin" dictatorship and her "view on the north" is just the same as that of the former "yusin" dictator and traitor Lee Myung Bak.
					
					 It is needless to say that if she is allowed to come to power as she is making so desperate efforts to justify the "yusin" dictatorship utterly indifferent to public opinion at home and abroad, south Korean society will certainly meet disaster and the inter-Korean relations totally collapse. 
					
					 This will inevitably lead to the revival of the "yusin" dictatorship in south Korea, the escalation of confrontation between the north and the south and the increase of the danger of a war.
					
					 People from all walks of life in south Korea should not be taken in by the crafty tricks of the "Saenuri Party." They should not allow the revival of the second "yusin" dictatorship but resolutely oppose and reject it.

articles.title: Credentials from Kuwaiti Ambassador
articles.content:
Credentials from Kuwaiti Ambassador
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, received credentials from Mohammad Saleh Al-Thuwaikh, ambassador of Kuwait to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday.
					 Kim had a talk with the ambassador after receiving the credentials.

articles.title: Int'l Film Festival Closes
articles.content:
Int'l Film Festival Closes
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) --The 13th Pyongyang International Film Festival was closed with due ceremony at the East Pyongyang Grand Theater on Thursday. The festival was opened on Sept. 20.
					 Present there were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Kim Yong Jin, vice-premier of the Cabinet, Hong Kwang Sun, minister of Culture who is chairman of the Festival Organizing Committee, and other officials concerned, playwrights and artistes in the field of film, people in the city, foreign delegations and delegates and international jury. 
					
					 Foreign diplomatic envoys, embassy officials and members of missions of international organizations here were present there on invitation.
					
					 At the closing ceremony, the results announced by the jury on films presented in the festival were given and prizes were awarded.
					
					 A letter to the dear respected Kim Jong Un from the participants in the festival was adopted.
					
					 Hong Kwang Sun said in his closing speech that films of various themes such as the dignity and prosperity of the nation and the worth happiness of life screened at the festival.
					
					 Hong expressed conviction that the participants would adhere to the idea of independence, peace and friendship and make contributions to developing progressive cinema arts.

articles.title: Reception Given for Int'l Film Festival Participants
articles.content:
Reception Given for Int'l Film Festival Participants
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Cabinet hosted a reception for the participants in the 13th Pyongyang International Film Festival at the People's Palace of Culture on Thursday to mark its successful conclusion. 
					 Invited to the reception were foreign delegations and delegates and international jury members who took part in the festival. 
					
					 Kim Yong Jin, vice-premier of the Cabinet, Hong Kwang Sun, minister of Culture who is chairman of the Festival Organizing Committee, and other officials concerned were present there.

articles.title: Results Announced by Jury of Int'l Film Festival
articles.content:
Results Announced by Jury of Int'l Film Festival
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- The results announced by the jury of the 13th Pyongyang International Film Festival held from Sept. 20 to 27 are as follows:
					Grand Prix: "Big Hope" (Germany)
					
					Best Direction: "Comrade Kim Goes Flying" (DPRK-UK)
					
					Best Screenplay: "Full Circle" (China) 
					
					Best Photography: "Bol" (Pakistan)
					
					Best Actor: "Big Hope" (German Daniel Bruhl)
					
					Best Actress: "House of the Wind" (Russian Polina Kutepova)
					
					Best Art: "Qian Xuesen" (China) 
					
					Best Music: "Women on the 6th Floor" (France)
					
					Best Technology: "Qian Xuesen" (China)
					
					Best Direction of Documentary and Short Movie: "Dive" (Philippines) 
					
					Best Script: "Tones of Passion" (Switzerland) 
					
					Best Photography: "Day In Day Out" (Indonesia) 
					
					Special Prize of International Jury: "Asmaa" (Egypt) 
					
					Special Prize of Festival Organizing Committee: "Meet in Pyongyang" (DPRK-China) 
					
					Special Screening Prize; "Wishes" (DPRK), "White Tiger" (Russia).

articles.title: Message from Int'l Film Festival Participants
articles.content:
Message from Int'l Film Festival Participants
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a message from the participants in the 13th Pyongyang International Film Festival (PIFF) on Thursday.
					 The message said that the festival marked a meaningful occasion in achieving social progress and prosperity common to mankind, deepening the bonds of friendship among movie persons of various countries of the world and promoting the development of national movies thanks to sincere efforts and cooperation of excellent movie persons of the DPRK and the world. 
					
					 During our brief stay in Pyongyang we participants of the festival saw for ourselves the signal successes made by your country in the building of a thriving nation and in the cultural field, it noted, and continued: 
					
					 All this would be unthinkable apart from the patriotic life of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who are always alive in the hearts of the Korean people.
					
					 The wise leadership of Kim Jong Un who is pursuing politics of love for the people to realize the intentions of the Generalissimos of the DPRK convinced us of a rosy future of the DPRK.
					
					 The participants of the festival in the message evinced their resolution to produce good films in the future, too, and sincerely take part in the Pyongyang International Film Festival based on the idea of independence, peace and friendship.

articles.title: Chinese Ambassador to DPRK Gives Reception
articles.content:
Chinese Ambassador to DPRK Gives Reception
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- Chinese Ambassador to the DPRK Liu Hongcai gave a reception at Okryu Restaurant Thursday to mark the 63rd anniversary of the People's Republic of China. 
					 Present there on invitation were Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun, Vice-department Director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Kim Song Nam, officials concerned, foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations here.
					
					 Liu Hongcai said in a speech made at the reception that the Communist Party of China founded a new China 63 years ago by leading the people to victory in revolution, ushering in a new era in China's history.
					
					 He said he was pleased at the fact that the dear respected Kim Jong Un has made great achievements in developing the economy, improving the people's standard of living and other fields by leading the party, the army and the people, true to the behests of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Hong expressed willingness to make efforts to give welfare to the two peoples by boosting cooperation in different fields in the spirit of "inheriting the tradition, facing up to the future, building good-neighborly friendship and strengthening cooperation" and putting the Sino-DPRK friendly relations onto a new phase together with the Korean comrades.
					
					 Pak Ui Chun said that the founding of PRC was a historic event that brought about a fundamental turn in the struggle of the Chinese people for carving out their destiny independently and creatively.
					
					 Over the past 63 years the Chinese people have strived hard to build a prosperous socialist state and thus brought about changes in all fabrics of social life, he noted.
					
					 He hoped that the fraternal Chinese people would achieve greater success in their efforts to build a comprehensively well-off socialist society based on the scientific outlook on development under the leadership of the Communist Party of China led by General Secretary Hu Jintao and significantly greet the 18th Congress of the Party.

articles.title: Chinese Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Chinese Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Chinese State Administration of Radio, Film and Television led by Vice-Minister Li Wei visited Mangyongdae.
					 At the old home of President Kim Il Sung in Mangyongdae they looked round historic relics with keen attention, being briefed on his revolutionary career.
					
					 They had a photo taken before the President's old home.
					
					 The head of the delegation said he was greatly impressed to visit the birthplace of the President, adding that he once again realized how the victory of the Korean revolution was achieved.
					
					 They also visited the Tower of the Juche Idea, Arch of Triumph, Friendship Tower, Pyongyang Cultural Exhibition, etc.

articles.title: Chinese Academy of Sciences Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Delegation of Chinese Academy of Sciences Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Chinese Academy of Sciences headed by Fang Xin, vice chief of the party organization of the academy, visited Mangyongdae.
					 The guests looked round historic relics at the old home of President Kim Il Sung in Mangyongdae with keen attention, being briefed on his revolutionary history and his patriotic and revolutionary family members.
					
					 At the end of the visit the head of the delegation said that Kim Il Sung is the eternal leader of the Korean people and a close friend of the Chinese people, adding that he is always alive in the hearts of not only the Korean people but also the Chinese people.
					
					 Meanwhile, the delegation visited the Tower of the Juche Idea, Arch of Triumph, National Gifts Exhibition House, Friendship Tower, etc.

articles.title: Seminar Marks Anniversary Guidance of Military Training of Students
articles.content:
Seminar Marks Anniversary Guidance of Military Training of Students
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- A seminar took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Thursday to mark the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's guidance of the military training of students of Kim Il Sung University in Oun-dong camp.
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, Mun Kyong Dok, Jo Yon Jun, and officials concerned and teachers and students of universities here including Kim Il Sung University and employees of the Oun Revolutionary Museum.
					
					 The participants in the seminar observed a moment's silence in memory of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Song Ja Rip, president of Kim Il Sung University and minister of Higher Education, and other speakers noted that his guidance was a turning point which showed in practice what level of the arts of pen and sword a modern statesman and leader should master and how to lead the masses from the standpoint of attaching importance to military affairs, and consolidated the eternal cornerstone of carrying forward the revolutionary cause of Songun.
					
					 The speakers called upon all the young students to shine forever the undying feats the great man of Mt. Paektu performed in the days of his guidance and to prepare themselves to be reliable Songun revolutionary vanguard keeping to the road of Juche, Songun and socialism true to the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: 31st Yun I Sang Concert Opens
articles.content:
31st Yun I Sang Concert Opens
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- The 31st Yun I Sang concert was opened.
					 The concert, an annual event in Pyongyang, marks an occasion of instilling confidence in national reconciliation and unity and national reunification into all Koreans.
					
					 An opening concert took place at the Yun I Sang Concert Hall on Thursday.
					
					 Among the audience were officials concerned, creators and artistes of art organizations here, working people in Pyongyang and overseas Koreans.
					
					 Vice-Minister of Culture Han Chol said in his speech the concert would help stir up the desire of compatriots for reunification.
					
					 It began with female solo "Forest Is Swaying". Put on the stage were such numbers as "Yungdan" for stringed instruments and first chamber symphony and Tchaikovsky's "Romeo and Juliet Fantasy Overture," etc.
					
					 The concert was acclaimed by the audience for its successful representation of themes of music pieces through refined rendition.
					
					 The concert will last till Saturday.

articles.title: Papers Call for Giving Full Play to Advantages of Education System
articles.content:
Papers Call for Giving Full Play to Advantages of Education System
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers of the DPRK Thursday in their editorials call for giving full play to the advantages of the socialist education system in the DPRK, bearing deep in mind the nation's pride and self-confidence in enforcing the universal 12-year compulsory education.
					 The ordinance on enforcing the universal 12-year compulsory education was promulgated at the recent Sixth Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.
					
					 The universal 12-year compulsory education represents the development in depth of the universal 11-year compulsory education, Rodong Sinmun says, and goes on:
					
					 The promulgation of the ordinance marks an important occasion in bringing about a radical turn in the educational work as required by the age of the knowledge-based economy.
					
					 The universal 12-year compulsory education is a higher phase of the secondary general education system. 
					
					 The advantages of the new education system lie in that it is aimed at helping the younger generation round off the secondary general education in the period of the 12-year systematic education which consists of one-year pre-school education, five-year primary school education, three-year junior middle school education and three-year senior middle school education. The new education system will bring about a dramatic change in the secondary general education ranging from the system, contents and methods of education to training teachers and providing conditions for education. The promulgation of the ordinance is of great significance as it is an important measure for further perfecting the DPRK's educational system and bringing about a radical turn in the educational work as required by the age of IT and the age of the knowledge-based economy.
					
					 It provides a sure guarantee to fully preparing the younger generation as strong pillars of the Songun revolution and able persons for the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 The new education system will help students firmly equip themselves with the revolutionary outlook on the world, learn secondary general knowledge and modern basic technological knowledge useful in practice and acquire creative ability for conducting independent activities after proceeding to society upon their graduation.
					
					 The country's future depends on the educational work. The revolutionary cause of Juche, the Songun revolutionary cause is sure to triumph and the future of the DPRK is immensely rosy thanks to the reliable ranks of successors growing up stoutly under the Juche-oriented educational system.
					
					 Minju Joson calls on all people to make vigorous endeavors for successfully putting into force the universal 12-year compulsory education, true to the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un's noble outlook on the younger generation and the future.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Embodying Spirit of Changsong Conference
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Embodying Spirit of Changsong Conference
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun on Thursday in a bylined article calls on all officials, party members and other working people to spruce up their counties and villages as a land of bliss under socialism and a cradle of happiness by fully embodying the spirit of the Changsong Joint Conference.
					 The basic spirit of the conference is that all counties should manage their economic life assiduously by their own efforts to suit their specific conditions so that all their people may lead a happy life, the article says, and continues:
					
					 The conference was a historic meeting as it helped bring about a great turn in increasing the role of the county and improving the people's living standard by developing the local industry and rural economy.
					
					 The spirit of the conference is the fruition of the indefatigable efforts and devotion of President Kim Il Sung who dedicated his all to the prosperity of the country and the happiness of its people.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il visited Changsong County two times in the new century, indicating principles and ways for the county to manage its economic life assiduously and kindling the torch of the movement for developing local industry there.
					
					 The dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Build All Counties into People's Paradise Good to Live in by Embodying Spirit of Historic Changsong Joint Conference" is of important significance in dynamically speeding up the present general advance for the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 The work comprehensively clarifies the principle and important tasks to manage economic life of all counties and turn them into a paradise of people in the spirit of the conference.
					
					 All counties should fully embody the spirit as intended by Kim Jong Un. Herein lies the shortest cut to rapidly developing the local industry and agriculture and increasing the overall national economic potential to enable the people to lead a happy life.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Increasing Might of Anti-Imperialist Forces
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Increasing Might of Anti-Imperialist Forces
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- The anti-imperialist independent forces are a powerful driving force for accomplishing the human cause of independence.
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 The cause of global independence is carried out by the involvement and role of all political forces and other forces struggling for independence, peace and socialism, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The socialist forces are the backbone of the anti-imperialist independent forces in the world. They are standing firm against imperialism and all reactionary forces. They are contributing to accomplishing the human cause of independence and peace through their struggle for independence against imperialism. The DPRK is holding high the banner of struggle against the imperialist hegemonic forces.
					
					 The banner of socialism is fluttering in Asia, and Venezuela and other countries in Latin America are emerging new anti-imperialist independent forces aspiring after socialism. African countries, too, are aspiring after socialism.
					
					 The non-aligned movement is powerful anti-imperialist independent forces in the present era.
					
					 The NAM, which has developed into the broadest international movement grouping huge population and 120 countries of the world, dramatically changed the balance of forces between progress and reaction and put strong spurs to the process of global independence.  The NAM could grow to be powerful forces energetically pushing forward the era of independence as it has preserved and developed the tradition of unity.
					
					 The might of the anti-imperialist independent forces of the world lies in the developing countries. They have tremendous economic potentials and account for more than 70 percent of the world's population.
					
					 They have huge scientific and technological forces.
					
					 Their might finds its vivid expression in that they are positively pushing forward regional integration and the multipolarization of the world through economic cooperation bodies.
					
					 Their rapid economic development in the new century draws international attention. 
					
					 The anti-imperialist independent forces in the world grew stronger in their might in the new century, far from becoming weak. They are incomparably stronger than the imperialist hegemonic forces. 
					
					 No force on earth can prevent the anti-imperialist independent forces from dynamically advancing towards the global independence.

articles.title: S. Korean Navy's Drills in West Sea of Korea Accused
articles.content:
S. Korean Navy's Drills in West Sea of Korea Accused
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- The south Korean navy's 2nd fleet staged a military exercise for a war against the DPRK in the waters off Tokjok Island in the West Sea of Korea on Tuesday, according to the south Korean Internet paper Thongil News.
					 The south Korean warmongers put to the sea a flotilla of storm-boats and high speed warships equipped with guided missiles for the frantic naval bombardment, voicing it was for making full preparedness in performing forward watch duty.
					
					 Far from drawing lessons from their defeat in Yonphyong Island shelling incident, they were going to ignite a war by staging continuous war drills aimed at the DPRK in the West Sea of Korea, where there is high possibility of military conflicts between the DPRK and south Korea.
					
					 They should remember the war maniacs are doomed to meet a stern punishment and the most shameful ruin.

articles.title: Signature Campaign for New Education Launched in South Korea
articles.content:
Signature Campaign for New Education Launched in South Korea
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- The Taejon Civic Organization for Implementing New Education in 2013 composed of more than 20 civic organizations in Taejon of south Korea launched the one million signature campaign on September 24 for realizing genuine education.
					 The organization held a meeting prior to the start of the signature campaign.
					
					 The organization said at the meeting that the citizens' solidarity organization was formed for the repeal of the unpopular education policy and to make 2013 the year of establishing the new education system in Taejon following Seoul.
					
					 It said that they would positively struggle for a solution to the registration fee issue, enactment of the law for the rights of the juvenile, school youth and children, etc.
					
					 It vowed to wage diverse activities for providing new conditions for education including a mass rally in front of the Educational Office of Taejon on October 17.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye's Deceptive Apology Denounced
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye's Deceptive Apology Denounced
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- The victims in the period of the Park Chung-Hee's dictatorial regime held a meeting on Sept. 24 outside the "National Assembly" building of south Korea at which they denounced the apology made by Park Geun Hye, presidential candidate from "Saenuri Party".
					 The speakers said even though Park Geun Hye said she apologized for the "yusin" dictatorship, she utterly remains unchanged in her stand.
					
					 The wounds sustained by victims to the past Park Chung-Hee regime remain unhealed and Park Geun Hye's apology caused harmful effects like rubbing salt into their wounds, the ralliers said, and went on:
					
					 Park Geun Hye is just identical to her father who sought longer stay in power with the help of "yusin" and in an illegal manner.
					
					 She tried to conceal her true colors as a conspirator in "yusin" dictatorship, they charged.
					
					 Her appearance itself is the revival of "yusin", they added.
					
					 They said they didn't want to hear her deceptive apology, saying she had better shut her mouth.

articles.title: PSI Blamed for Escalating Military Tension on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
PSI Blamed for Escalating Military Tension on Korean Peninsula
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea held the 127th disarmament rally for peace in Seoul on Sept. 25 in protest against the proliferation security initiative of weapons of mass destruction (PSI) escalating the military tension on the Korean Peninsula.
					 Speakers at the rally said that the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade and the Ministry of Defence on Sept. 26 and 27 announced they would stage a sea interception drill for searching and tracking ships suspected of carrying WMD which constitutes the key factor of the PSI drill.
					
					 The drill will reportedly involve not only south Korea and the U.S. but the Japanese "Self-Defence Forces", they added.
					
					 They accused the U.S. of seeking to boost the military alliance for aggression and hold a military edge in Asia through the PSI drill, condemning the Lee Myung Bak regime for steadily pursuing its confrontational policy toward the north with the help of the U.S. and Japan.
					
					 In particular, Japan is betraying its undisguised attempt for turning itself into a military giant and staging a comeback to Korea, they said, charging that PSI is nothing but a declaration of war as it is part of the policy to blockade the north.
					
					 They demanded warmongers immediately stop the PSI drill which stirs up the military tension and conflict and threatens peace in the peninsula.

articles.title: Koreans in Japan Praise New Educational System in Homeland
articles.content:
Koreans in Japan Praise New Educational System in Homeland
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- Choe In Thae, principal of the Korean junior higher middle school in Ibaraki who is heading the visiting group of Korean students of higher schools in Japan, said he was deeply impressed to hear the media report about the 6th Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.
					 He went on:
					
					 The Sixth Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly adopted an ordinance "On enforcing universal 12-year compulsory education".
					
					 I was deeply touched to hear this news.
					
					 It is something amazing that such education is to be enforced in the homeland despite its hard economic conditions.
					
					 Such thing can take place in our homeland only which has paid primary attention to the education of the younger generation.
					
					 I keenly realized the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un's noble love for the younger generation and future as he has creditably carried forward the idea and cause of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who spared nothing for the rising generation.
					
					 The enforcement of the above-said compulsory education is a great event showing before the whole world the real picture of the country dynamically advancing as a highly civilized socialist country under the banner of the great Juche idea.
					
					 It provided a sure guarantee for putting the secondary general education on a higher stage.
					
					 Education is a very important work for the future of the nation and the younger generation. It is one of the key issues on which hinge the rise and fall of the country.
					
					 When looking back on history, the homeland spared nothing for the development of the education of the rising generation.
					
					 Under the wise leadership of the great Generalissimos the education in the homeland covered the path of steady development. It enforced the universal 11-year compulsory education, the first of its kind in the world.
					
					 It is thanks to the fine policy of the party and state that the homeland turned into a country of education and learning.
					
					 Whenever I visited the homeland, I was deeply impressed to see such educational facilities as modern schools and schoolchildren's palace and centers for extracurricular education.
					
					 In this course, I deeply grasped the advantages of the socialist education system in the homeland.
					
					 Great successes being achieved in the homeland are associated with the shining feats and merits of the young scientists and other young people who received Juche-based education.
					
					 The new education system will prove successful thanks to Kim Jong Un's love for the rising generation and the future as he is wisely leading the new century of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's Korea to victory and glory.
					
					 The children of Koreans in Japan, too,  are given ample opportunity of learning at their schools, their talents in full bloom, under the deep care of the immensely benevolent socialist homeland.
					
					 I will do my best to train all students to be reliable pillars giving steady continuity to the tradition of patriotism and that of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan true to the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Works Introduced by Russian Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Works Introduced by Russian Paper
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- The gist of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Comrade Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and People" was given publicity by the Russian paper Moya Interesnaya Gazeta No. 7.
					 The work, published on April 20, 2012, clarifies the revolutionary feats performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in their lifetime and indicates the tasks for firmly upholding their idea and feats and glorifying them forever.
					
					 The paper carried a portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung and photo on revolutionary activities of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 "Only Victory and Glory Are in Store for Us Advancing under the Uplifted Immortal Banners Bearing Portraits of Smiling Great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il", the speech made by Kim Jong Un at the banquet given to celebrate August 25, and his congratulatory message to the participants in the celebrations of the Youth Day and the young people throughout the country were posted on the Internet homepage by the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain on Sept.1.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk Praised by Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk Praised by Nigerian Organization
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea posted an article titled "Kim Jong Suk always remembered by humankind" on its internet homepage on Sept. 19 on the 63rd anniversary of the passing of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese war hero.
					 The article said Kim Jong Suk is always remembered by the Korean people and the world progressives as an anti-Japanese woman hero and outstanding woman revolutionary for her distinguished contributions to the country's liberation and the building of a new country.
					
					 It said the Korean people erected her statues in the areas and units associated with her noble life and immortal feats and they were named after her.
					
					 It also cites facts that institutions and organizations of many countries go by her august name, honorary titles, orders, medals, silk banners and gifts were presented to her, poems and songs praising her revolutionary feats were created and books and picture albums on her shining life were published.
					
					 Diverse political and cultural events take place in different areas of the world every year on her birth and death anniversaries, the article said.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk Praised by British Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk Praised by British Organizations
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on Sept. 16 on the 63rd anniversary of the passing of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese war hero.
					 The statement said though Kim Jong Suk passed away so early, she is always remembered by all Korean people and the Juche idea followers throughout the world. 
					
					 It went on:
					
					 We praise her as the great mother of Korea.
					
					 Born in a simple family in Hoeryong, she embarked upon the road of revolution in her early years for the country's independence from the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 She joined the Korean People's Revolutionary Army led by President Kim Il Sung, grew up to be an ardent woman revolutionary and an anti-imperialist fighter and devoted herself to accomplishing the sacred cause of the country's liberation.
					
					 She earned fame as a lifeguard of Kim Il Sung by protecting his safety at the risk of her life, woman general of guerillas and a crack shot during the anti-Japanese war.
					
					 She was a great example of loyalty to the leader.
					
					 She made a great contribution to the development of the Korean women's movement.
					
					 She was a brilliant paragon of women revolutionaries.
					
					 She devoted herself to building new democratic Korea and made a great contribution to building the revolutionary armed forces after the country's liberation, thereby making sure that the Songun revolutionary cause made dynamic progress.
					
					 She gave birth to leader Kim Jong Il and brought him up as the shining star of Mt. Paektu, making an immortal contribution to carrying forward and developing the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Her august name will always be remembered by the world revolutionary people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensajes de respuesta a jefes de Estado
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensajes de respuesta a jefes de Estado
Pyongyang, 27 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio mensajes de respuesta a los jefes de Estado de varios paises quienes le dirigieron mensajes de consuelo en ocasion de que algunas zonas de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea sufrieron danos por el tifon.
					Los destinatarios son Mohammed Waheed Hassan, presidente de la Republica de las Islas Maldivas, Aleksandr Lukashenko, presidente de la Republica de Belarus, y Armando Emilio Guebuza, presidente de la Republica de Mozambique.
					
					En sus misivas, el Mariscal expreso agradecimiento por el despacho de los mensajes de consuelo y manifesto su conviccion de que se intensificaran y se desarrollaran mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre la RPDC y los paises respectivos.

articles.title: CRPP revela astucia de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
CRPP revela astucia de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 27 de septiembre (ACNC) -- En la reciente conferencia de prensa, la candidata presidencial del "Partido Saenuri", Park Geun-hye acuso a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea al exponer su posicion en cuanto al "golpe de Estado del 16 de mayo" y la dictadura de "renovacion".
					Al respecto, el vocero del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria dio el dia 27 una respuesta siguiente a la pregunta formada por un reportero de la Agencia Central de Noticias de Corea.
					
					En estos dias, en el Sur de Corea el asunto de dictadura de "renovacion" atrae atencion principal de la situacion de las "elecciones presidenciales". Bajo tal circunstancia, Park Geun-hye, candidata presidencial del "Partido Saenuri", organizo el dia 24 la "conferencia de prensa emergente", ocasion en la cual reconocio la ilegalidad del "golpe del 16 de mayo", la "renovacion", el caso del Partido Revolucionario del Pueblo, etc. y pidio "disculpa" a sus victimas.
					
					Hasta hace poco, ella elogio el mencionado golpe y la "renovacion" describiendolos como inevitables "opciones historicas", y ahora cambio  apresuradamente su posicion, por la preocupacion de que ojala se fracase en las "elecciones presidenciales" por el aumento de la protesta de la opinion publica y la baja de la popularidad debido a sus palabras de encomio a la dictadura de "renovacion y por el ascenso de la popularidad de otros candidatos del circulo opositor.
					
					Lo problematico es que ella se atrevio a acusar a la RPDC diciendo que el "golpe del 16 de mayo" y la "renovacion" fueron inevitables para prevenir la "agresion al Sur por el Norte (de Corea)" y defender la "seguridad".
					
					Con anterioridad, en varias ocasiones, tambien insistio en que en las decadas de 1960 y 1970 era muy debil el poderio nacional del Sur de Corea, razon por la cual se encontraba ante la "grave amenaza del Norte" y apunto que si no hubieran existido el "golpe del 16 de mayo" y la "renovacion" el Sur se habria conquistado por el Norte.
					
					Y justifico la dictadura de "renovacion" agregando que el hecho de haber sido oprimida la democracia en aquel entonces no era tan problematico.
					
					Asi la candidata Park, que amparaba tanto el "golpe del 16 de mayo" y la "renovacion", se vio obligada a pedir disculpa por el respecto y atribuyo el "golpe del 16 de mayo" y la "promulgacion del sistema de renovacion" a la supuesta "amenaza del Norte", lo cual consterna a todo el mundo.
					
					Su palabra ilogica constituye una gran tergiversacion sobre la verdad historica.
					
					En aquel tiempo era mas fuerte que antes el animo por la reunificacion pacifica en ambas partes coreanas gracias al Levantamiento Popular de Abril y la  publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 4 de Julio y no existia nada la "amenaza del Norte".
					
					Despues del Levantamiento Popular de Abril, los habitantes surcoreanos manifestaron en pleno despliegue el deseo y la voluntad de la reunificacion pacifica bajo la consigna "!Vamos al Norte, ven al Sur y encontremonos en Phanmunjom!" diciendo que la reunificacion solo es el medio de subsistencia.
					
					 En respuesta a ello, la RPDC presento el mas justo proyecto de dejar tal como eran los regimenes politicos existentes en el Norte y el Sur de Corea, organizar el aparato comun de la nacion y aplicar el sistema federativo que promueve el desarrollo unificado de ambas partes para realizar de manera pacifica la reunificacion del pais.
					
					 Por tal motivo, no existia ninguna "amenaza del Norte".
					
					 Al juzgar la circunstancia de 1972 en que el traidor Park Chung Hee inventaba la "constitucion  renovada", todo el mundo conoce que fueron presentados por la RPDC los Tres Principios de la Reunificacion de la Patria: la independencia, la reunificacion pacifica y la gran unidad nacional, los cuales fueron publicados solemnemente al interior y exterior del pais como Declaracion Conjunta del 4 de Julio.
					
					  Como ya se revelo totalmente ante todo el mundo, el "golpe de Estado del 16 de mayo" y la "renovacion de octubre" fue de rabo a cabo una atrocidad fascista del traidor Park Chung Hee, gangster militar proyanqui y projapones tendente a quitar el "poder" y mantener la dominacion dictatorial.
					
					  A pesar de esto, la candidata del "Partido Saenuri" Park Geun-Hye se atrevio a acusar a la RPDC justificando el "golpe de Estado del 16 de mayo" y la "renovacion", lo cual es la grave provocacion intolerable.
					
					  La entrevista demuestra que no se ha cambiado nada su posicion en cuanto al "golpe de Estado del 16 de mayo" y la "renovacion" y su "concepcion del Norte" tambien es igual a la del ex dictador de "renovacion" y del traidor Lee Myung Bak.
					
					  Si toma el poder la candidata del "Partido Saenuri" que hace esfuerzos desesperados por justificar la dictadura de "renovacion" sin hacer caso de la opinion publica interna y externa, no cabe duda que seran tragicos el destino de la sociedad surcoreana y las relaciones Norte-Sur.
					
					  Esto llevara solo el renacimiento de la dictadura de "renovacion" en el Sur de Corea, la agravacion de confrontacion de ambas partes coreanas y el aumento del peligro de guerra.
					
					  Todas las clases y capas del Sur de Corea no deben enganarse por la trampa astuta de la banda del "Partido Saenuri", sino rechazar categoricamente la rehabilitacion de la "segunda dictadura de renovacion".

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de embajador de Kuwait
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de embajador de Kuwait
Pyongyang, 27 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Mohammad Saleh Al-Thuwaikh presento el dia 27 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae ante Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, sus cartas credenciales que le acreditan como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario del Estado de Kuwait en Corea.
					Tras recibirlas Kim departio con el nuevo diplomatico.

articles.title: Clausurado el XIII Festival Internacional de Cine de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Clausurado el XIII Festival Internacional de Cine de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 27 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Quedo clausurado el dia 27 en el Gran Teatro de Pyongyang Este el XIII Festival Internacional de Cine de Pyongyang inaugurado el 20.
					A la ocasion asistieron el vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Yang Hyong Sop, el vicepremier Kim Yong Jin, el presidente del Comite Organizador del Festival, Hong Kwang Sun quien es ministro de Cultura y otros funcionarios, los creadores y artistas de la rama cinematografica, los trabajadores capitalinos, las delegaciones y delegados de varios paises y calificadores internacionales.
					
					Fueron invitados los representantes diplomaticos y miembros de las embajadas de varios paises y los miembros de las representaciones de las organizaciones internacionales, acreditados en Corea.
					
					Fue publicado el resultado de calificacion sobre las peliculas presentadas en el Festival y hubo premiacion.
					
					Quedo aprobada una carta de los participantes en el Festival al Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					En el discurso clausural, Hong Kwang Sun dijo que en la ocasion fueron proyectadas las peliculas con diferentes temas sobre la dignidad y prosperidad de la nacion y el valor y felicidad de la vida.
					
					Expuso su conviccion de que los participantes seguiran manteniendo el ideal de la independencia, la paz y la amistad tambien en el futuro y contribuyendo al desarrollo del arte cinematografico progresivo.

articles.title: Periodicos llaman a manifestar la superioridad de sistema de educacion
articles.content:
Periodicos llaman a manifestar la superioridad de sistema de educacion
Pyongyang, 27 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Los periodicos capitalinos publicaron el dia 27 los editoriales subrayando la necesidad de poner de pleno manifiesto la superioridad del sistema de educacion socialista de nuestro pais con el gran orgullo y dignidad nacionales por la implantacion de la ensenanza obligatoria general de 12 anos.
					 En el sexto periodo de sesiones de la XII Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea fue publicada la ley de implantacion de la ensenanza obligatoria general de 12 anos.
					
					 El diario Rodong Sinmun senala que el sistema de ensenanza obligatoria general de 12 anos significa el desarrollo del sistema anterior de 11 anos, y continua: 
					
					  La ley recien promulgada es un importante motivo para traer un cambio trascendental en la educacion de acuerdo con las demandas de la era de economia basada en la intelectualidad. 
					
					  El sistema de ensenanza obligatoria general de 12 anos es la nueva etapa elevada del sistema de ensenanza media general.
					
					El nuevo sistema de educacion posibilita perfeccionar la educacion media general para las nuevas generaciones durante 12 anos de educacion sistematica que abarca la ensenanza preescolar de un ano, la primaria de 5 anos, la secundaria basica de 3 anos y la secundaria superior de 3 anos. He aqui la superioridad del nuevo sistema educacional.
					
					  Gracias al nuevo sistema educacional, se renovaran las labores de la educacion media general desde el sistema, contenidos y metodos didacticos hasta la formacion de maestros y las condiciones educacionales. 
					
					  La promulgacion de la ley en cuestion es una importante medida para perfeccionar el sistema de educacion del pais de acuerdo con las demandas de la era de industria de informatica, la de economia basada en la intelectualidad, y lograr un cambio radical en la educacion. 
					
					Ademas, sirve de una firma garantia para formar a las nuevas generaciones como pilar de la revolucion del Songun y dignos trabajadores de la construccion del Estado prospero.
					
					 En el periodo de educacion, los alumnos estableceran cabalmente la concepcion revolucionaria del mundo, aprenderan los conocimientos generales de nivel medio  y otros tecnicos basicos modernos aplicables en la practica y dispondran de la capacidad creativa para actuar con independencia despues de graduarse de la escuela. 
					
					La labor docente refleja el futuro de la patria. Gracias a contar con las nuevas generaciones que crecen recibiendo la autoctona educacion, es invencible la causa revolucionaria del Juche, la del Songun y es muy radiante el futuro de nuestra patria. 
					
					  Por otra parte, el periodico Minju Joson exhorta a todos a dinamizar la labor para implementar con exito la educacion obligatoria general de 12 anos en acato al noble proposito del amor al futuro del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
